title: In search of a landscape
creator_credit: Hannah Dunne and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: The pre-performance preparations by Hannah Dunne and her dance troupe as they practice for their performance of “In search of a landscape”. Hannah describes to the viewer how she arrived at the name for this particular piece. NB: This video was donated by the performer and has a grainy quality. You do not need to adjust your machine.
